settings.heading: How does Unplug work?
settings.content: Unplug combines restorative minerals with calming amino acids and soothing herbal extracts. The botanical extracts inside Unplug nourish the brain and gently help you drift off. This is unlike synthetic sleeping pills that just knock you out and leave you groggy.
settings.text_1: How much sleep is enough? A good rule of thumb is to aim for 7-9 hours each night. Unplug not only helps you get to sleep faster, but also helps you stay asleep until your body is fully rested. Eventually, you will find yourself waking up naturally rested without an alarm.
settings.text_2:
Getting enough deep, restorative sleep is crucial to waking up refreshed. If you use a wearable sleep tracker, pay attention to shifts in REM sleep during the first few nights of taking Unplug.

If you don't have a tracker, you might still be able to notice this change via an increase in vivid dreams which will settle after a week. Unplug is working its magic :-)
settings.text_3: We all have 24 hours in the day, and sometimes it's hard to get to bed earlier. That's where sleep latency, or sleep onset, becomes so important. This is the time it takes to fall asleep once you're in bed. Watch what happens to your sleep latency after 4 weeks of using Unplug - you may be amazed!
settings.text_4: Unplug is not a sedative, and if your child shouts for help, you're going to wake up. The difference is Unplug helps your body to reach a parasympathetic "resting" state, meaning you'll find it infinitely easier to fall back asleep without tossing and turning for hours.

settings.heading: How does Power Up work?
settings.content: Power Up provides jitter-free energy. It does what coffee struggles to do: give you calm, clean and long-lasting energy without that wired feeling. To do this, Power Up combines high doses of energising B-vitamins with gently stimulating, caffeine-free botanicals and brain-fuelling amino acids.
settings.text_1: Did you know your brain consumes a quarter of your nutrient intake? And yet rarely do we think about eating for our brain. Power Up is here to fix this by providing your brain with everything it is lacking for boundless mental energy through the day. Even through that 2pm slog.
settings.text_2: Mood swings and brain fog are your brain's way of crying out for help. By including the clever amino acid L-taurine and mood-modulating Panax Ginseng, Power Up helps maintain healthy bloodflow to the brain, ensuring stable nutrient supply and avoiding hangry moodswings.
settings.text_3: We all know the great feeling of accomplishment and pride that comes after completing a task. What if we could heighten this sensation? L-tyrosine is an amino acid involved in dopamine production, which gives you that feel-good factor of a job well done. More dopamine: more motivation!
settings.text_4: Do you remember what you had for lunch yesterday? Or the name of your barista this morning? Memory formation is tightly linked to choline supply. This essential nutrient is the number one cognitive support in the world, and it's involved in mental performance and healthy brain ageing.

settings.heading: How does Balance work?
settings.content: Balance is what you need for resilience and inner peace. When the world around you gets stressful, Balance restores feelings of calm by providing a triple source of restorative Magnesium along with energy building vitamins C and B6. It's how you wish that 5pm drink made you feel.
settings.text_1: Our hectic schedules and "always on" lifestyles wreak havoc to our hormonal levels. Balance supports healthy hormonal balancing for both men and women, including the regulation of testosterone levels. Imagine feeling in control of your day again without being hampered by mood swings and sudden energy peaks and troughs.
settings.text_2: A well-balanced life means stable energy levels, without any bouts of debilitating fatigue. Magnesium Ascorbate is added into each serving of Balance to help reduce those feelings of tiredness and fatigue.
settings.text_3: Chronic stress affects our entire metabolism. We can fight this through lifestyle choices - meditation and breathing exercises are powerful allies - and through nutritional support. Balance has been carefully formulated to support the nervous system so you can strengthen your inner resilience.
settings.text_4: The world will continue to spin. Emails will continue to come in, deadlines remain on the horizon. All you can control is how you respond to your environment. Balance is here to help by reducing peaks of cortisol stress hormones and raising your natural energy reserves.

settings.heading: How does Kids Bedtime work?
settings.content:
Unplug Kids Bedtime is a calming food blend you can add to dinner or mix into a warm drink or smoothie before bed. It is carefully and lovingly formulated to aid children's sleep and development.

Discover the Adventures of Sam Sloth

Kids don't settle? Unplug Kids Bedtime comes with magical audio bedtime stories.
settings.text_1: Herbal extracts of Lemon Balm, Chamomile and Saffron flower are included to help children wind down at bedtime for a sense of cosy peace and quiet.
settings.text_2: 100mg of elemental Magnesium provide the essential building blocks to support physical and mental recovery overnight by nourishing the nervous system, muscles and mind.
settings.text_3: Vitamin D and K are needed for healthy growth and development of bones in children - making Kids Bedtime not only about sleep but also a helpful aid for those overnight growth spurts.
settings.text_4: In addition to supporting skeletal development, vitamin D is also essential for a strong and healthy immune system in children. Better sleep, growth and immunity bundled together.

settings.heading: What makes Classic Collagen special?
settings.content:
Classic Collagen combines the benefits of Bovine and Marine peptides in one complete protein source.

Marine peptides provide type 1 collagen for skin elasticity, nail and hair strength.

Bovine peptides provide type 3 collagen, used in the body to improve gut, bone, joint and organ health.
settings.text_1:
Grass-fed bovine collagen peptides provide wonderful nourishment for our joints, ligaments and connective tissues.

The amino acids inside Classic Collagen are building blocks for an active lifestyle: keeping you moving squeak-free.

These building blocks also work wonderfully during pregnancy and breastfeeding, supporting mum's internal tissues and baby’s development.
settings.text_2:
As our bodies age, we naturally produce less collagen. From 30 years of age onwards, it's a good idea to begin supplementing with 10-12g of collagen daily.

Your body's way of thanking you for the small effort? Plump, freshly hydrated and glowing skin.
settings.text_3:
Collagen is a building block for nearly every tissue inside the body - including our gut lining. For this reason, including a daily dose of collagen may help improve your gut permeability, digestion and overall stress management.

Collagen is also an excellent source of the amino acid Glycine, which is a precursor to Serotonin - a hormone involved in good mood and healthy sleep.
settings.text_4:
We're here to make your life easier with effective, easy to use products that just work.

Every day, simply add two tablespoons of Classic Collagen to your tea, coffee or smoothie.

It's flavour-free and dissolves almost instantly in hot drinks.

Collagen is not heat-sensitive so you can even include it in baking or soups - an easy way to add protein to any dish.

settings.heading: Ingredients  - The 10 nutrients your brain needs to fall asleep
Ingredients and Nutritional Values: Peanut Butter Protein
Ingredients and Nutritional Values: Organic Whey Protein
Ingredients: nutrients for a zen state of mind
Ingredients: calming nutrients for a restorative night
Easy Collagen Recipes
settings.content:
Not sure where to start? We got you!

Try any of these super simple recipes. One of the many joys of using Classic Collagen is its simplicity and convenience. Go hot or cold, in a drink or food: enjoy it your way.
settings.text_1:
Any time of day, stir 1-2 tablespoons of Classic Collagen into your ready-to-drink tea or herbal tea.

The powder will dissolve easily after 15-30 seconds of stirring.
settings.text_2:
Need something to get you started and keep you going?
With the help of a whisk, combine one tablespoon of organic butter or ghee, two tablespoons of Classic Collagen, and a serving of freshly brewed hot coffee.

The fat from the butter will give you long-lasting energy and slow the breakdown of caffeine to avoid a cortisol spike.
settings.text_3:
Try this low-GI breakfast bowl for stable energy all morning:
Soak a half cup of oats in almond milk overnight, stir in a tablespoon each of nut butter and tahini, a dollop of plain yoghurt, two tablespoons of Classic Collagen and some fresh blueberries.
settings.text_4:
Classic Collagen is extremely heat stable, meaning you can cook with it and still enjoy all the skin-boosting, gut-healing benefits.

Add to hot soups, sauces and even baked goods and pancakes.

settings.timeline_content_5: You’ve built a fortress of inner calm and quietude. You’re doing great.
Your new normal has set in. You expect great sleep, every single night.
Downstream benefits have kicked in: with more energy, you exercise more, sleep deeper and are living happier.

settings.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.content: Got a question of your own? Ask us below
settings.text_1:
For a therapeutic dose of collagen, our nutritional therapists recommend at least 10-12g of Classic Collagen every day.

Doing so, most people will begin to see and feel visible results after 4-6 weeks of supplementation.
settings.title_2: Is it safe during pregnancy or breastfeeding?
settings.text_2:
Yes! Classic Collagen is safe and even beneficial during both pregnancy and breastfeeding.

As your body goes through pre and post natal transformations, supplementing with collagen peptides will help your skin and tissues stretch and repair, while helping baby develop and grow.
settings.title_3: Do I need to take it every day?
settings.text_3:
In order to get significant benefits from Classic Collagen, including youthful skin, stronger nails and hair and improved gut health, we do recommend sticking with 12g (two tablespoons) every day.

To give yourself the best chance, simply tag it onto an existing daily ritual of yours, such as a morning cuppa, an afternoon smoothie, or a bed time herbal tea.
settings.title_4: How do I get the refill pouch?
settings.text_4:
Our eco and home-compostable refill bags are available on our subscription service.

On first order, you will receive your tin and a bag. Subsequent deliveries will include refill pouches but no tins, reducing unnecessary waste while keeping your collagen sealed and fresh 🌱

settings.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.content: Got a question of your own? Ask us below
settings.title_1: What age is suitable for Kids Bedtime?
settings.text_1: We recommend Unplug Kids Bedtime to children 4 and over. Above the age of 7, you may wish to increase the dose to 1.5 teaspoons (about 4g). From teenage years onwards, we recommend our Unplug capsule supplement.
settings.title_2: When and how should I give Kids Bedtime?
settings.text_2: This is a super easy-to-use powder. For fussy eaters, we recommend mixing a teaspoon at dinner time - in mashed potato or mashed banana for example. Alternatively, mix into warm milk before bed.
settings.text_3:
Yes, absolutely. We've taken great care to formulate a product which is not only safe, but truly beneficial for children's development.

In addition to the nutritional goodness in Kids Bedtime, you won't find any sugar, sweeteners or flavourings which are so common in children's products.

As with all our products at Motion Nutrition, benefits will build up with regular use and there are no side effects so you can use Kids Bedtime ongoing.
settings.text_4: The stability, safety and efficacy of our ingredients are our number top priority. In order to ensure this consistency, we need to use microscopic amounts of carrier ingredients like vegetable cellulose and maltodextrin. Rest assured these are in such tiny quantities that they do not even carry any calorific values, unlike sugar-based kids products.

settings.heading: Frequently Asked Questions: Unplug
settings.text_1: We recommend taking Unplug in the evening about one hour before bed, and preferably away from food. If you are feeling overwhelmed or highly stressed, you can also take Unplug earlier in the day or alongside Balance.
settings.title_2: How quickly will I feel a difference with Unplug?
settings.text_2:
With Unplug, benefits build up over time. Most people will feel some initial sleep improvements from the very first night, and this will gradually improve over weeks and months.

During the first month, make a note of how quickly you fall asleep on average. You may notice this changing after the first 4 weeks.

After 3-6 months your “new normal” settles in and you’ll look forward to a great sleep, night after night.
settings.text_3: Not in the medicinal sense. Unplug helps induce feelings of cosiness and promotes deep sleep, but it is not a medication. It is a food-state supplement and a natural sleep supporter. It works by providing the nutritional building blocks your brain needs to produce sleep and relaxation hormones.
settings.text_4: You may experience some wild, vivid dreams over the first few nights as your brain catches up on sleep debt. Don’t worry! This is a sign that you are getting deep sleep, which is great. Typically, these intense dreams will go away after a week or so once you’ve caught up on sleep debt.

settings.text: See how your sleep compares with people your age. Get your Sleep Score (in 3 minutes)
